title: json unmarshal struct not work with lowercase member
body:
by **windyboy**: 
What does 'go version' print?
go version go1.3.1 windows/amd64

What steps reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.

1.http://play.golang.org/p/QYV95ZODoI
2.http://play.golang.org/p/-V2ABsA6k_

What happened?
The json unmarshal function with struct not work with lowercase name member

What should have happened instead?
It should works both uppercase and lowercase

Please provide any additional information below.
